review.title: “Environment for learning and professional development.”
review.pros: Pros – Opportunity to develop and implement new management and business models since it is a fairly new organization trying to respond to their rapid growth.
review.cons: Cons – Rigid structure and very slow decision making process.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – It is necessary to communicate better the company´s strategy , set clear goals and manage performance and results. It is also necessary to empower middle management giving more autonomy to act.

review.title: “Your cheese is always in movement”
